message.name: ERR_ASSESSMENT_STATUS_CANCELLED_ASSESSMENT_CANNOT_CANCELLED
message.locale: This assessment may not be canceled as it has already been canceled.
This assessment may not be cancelled as it has already been cancelled.

message.name: ERR_ASSESSMENT_STATUS_COMPLETED_ASSESSMENT_CANNOT_CANCELLED
message.locale: This assessment may not be canceled as it has already been completed.
This assessment may not be cancelled as it has already been completed.

message.name: ERR_ASSESSMENT_DATE_BEFORE_DC_STARTDATE
message.locale: The assessment date entered is before the start date of the determination %1d. Please enter a new assessment date or select a new assessment.

message.name: ERR_ASSESSMENT_DATE_AFTER_DC_ENDDATE
message.locale: The assessment date entered is after the end date of the determination %1d. Please enter a new assessment date.

message.name: ERR_ASSESSMENT_NO_DP_NO_COC
message.locale: There are no decision making criteria available for this Assessment for the Assessment Date entered. Please enter a new Assessment Date or select a different Assessment.

message.name: ERR_ASSESSMENT_NO_DP_COC
message.locale: There are no decision making criteria available for the Determination in this Assessment. Please enter a new Assessment Date or select a different Assessment.

message.name: ERR_ASSESSMENT_NO_DETERMINATION
message.locale: The selected assessment does not have a determination associated to it.

message.name: ERR_ASSESSMENT_STATUS_CANCELLED_ASSESSMENT_CANNOT_COMPLETE
message.locale: This assessment may not be completed as it has already been canceled.
This assessment may not be completed as it has already been cancelled.

message.name: ERR_ASSESSMENT_STATUS_COMPLETED_ASSESSMENT_CANNOT_COMPLETE
message.locale: This assessment may not be completed as it has already been completed.

message.name: ERR_ASSESSMENT_STATUS_CANCELLED__CANNOT_DO_CREATE_DECISION
message.locale: Decisions cannot be created as this assessment has already been canceled.
Decisions cannot be created as this assessment has already been cancelled.

message.name: ERR_ASSESSMENT_STATUS_COMPLETED_CANNOT_DO_CREATE_DECISION
message.locale: Decisions cannot be created as this assessment has already been completed.

message.name: ERR_ASSESSMENT_NO_DP_FOR_CLONE_ASSESSMENT
message.locale: 'There are no decision making criteria available for this Determination for this Effective Date. Please enter a new Effective Date or select Cancel to exit'.

message.name: ERR_ASSESSMENT_NO_ASSOCIATION_FOR_ASSESSMENT_DATE
message.locale: The assessment date entered is not valid as there is no association to this case type on this date. The association periods are as follows:%1s.Please enter a new assessment date or select a new assessment.

message.name: ERR_ASSESSMENT_MULTIPLE_DC_FOR_ASSESSMENT_DATE
message.locale: The assessment has more than one determination. Please select a new assessment.
